Audio.Locality: Km12, Piste de la Crique Dardanelles, Mana
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 8m. Same ‘lek’ as XC122513. Different ‘pink’ calls then ‘song’ from 0.32. At least four individuals (apparently all males) sat 1-5m apart on ground. Long periods of inactivity with some calling, then ‘songs’ associated with much shuffling on ground, some wing raising, occasionally culminating in short chasing flights.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
